references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF), a foundational technique for novel view synthesis that is heavily used and extended upon in the current paper's approach to 3D head avatar reconstruction.

references.paper_title: Learning a model of facial shape and expression from 4D scans
references.reason: This paper introduces the 3D Morphable Model (3DMM), a key component of the current paper's method, providing a prior for controlling facial expressions in the avatar reconstruction process.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper presents 3D Gaussian splatting, a crucial technique used in the current paper for efficient and high-quality rendering of the reconstructed 3D Gaussian head avatar.

references.paper_title: Styleheat: One-shot high-resolution editable talking face generation via pre-trained stylegan
references.reason: This paper is a relevant prior work focusing on 2D-based talking head synthesis, which the current paper aims to improve upon by using 3D Gaussian representations for better generalization and real-time performance.

references.paper_title: Gaussian head avatar: Ultra high-fidelity head avatar via dynamic Gaussians
references.reason: This paper is a closely related contemporary work that also uses 3D Gaussians for head avatar representation, providing a direct comparison point for evaluating the novelty and performance of the proposed method.
